description: Implements algorithms for the best subset regression problem in Julia
README.md:
# BestSubsetRegression

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/IainNZ/BestSubsetRegression.jl.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/IainNZ/BestSubsetRegression.jl)


Currently implements the first order optimization-based heuristic from the paper

> Bertsimas, King, Mazumder. "Best Subset Selection via a Modern Optimization Lens". [http://arxiv.org/abs/1507.03133](http://arxiv.org/abs/1507.03133)

to solve the regression problem

```
Find b such that
0.5 ||y - Xb||2^2
is minimized, subject to
||b||0 <= k
```

Or in other words, find the regression coefficients `b` to minimize square error such that no more than `k` of the coefficients are non-zero.
